des: "A great change from the standard egg salad, this is fabulous served on toasted whole grain bread. It can also be spooned into hollowed out tomatoes for a fancy presentation at a luncheon."
ins:
Place eggs in a saucepan and cover with cold water. Bring water to a boil; cover, remove from heat, and let eggs stand in hot water for 10 to 12 minutes. Remove from hot water, cool, peel and chop.
In a medium bowl, combine eggs, celery, onion, smoked salmon and mayonnaise. Season with dill, salt and pepper. Refrigerate at least 2 hours to allow flavors to combine.
